ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is what you are promised on the Day of Reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is what is promised you for the Day of Reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: All this is what you are promised for the Day of Judgement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is what they had been promised for the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is the promise being given to you, for the Day of Reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This it is what you are promised for the Day of Reckoning!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is what you are promised for the day of reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is what you were promised for the Day of Reckoning;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This it is that ye are promised for the Day of Reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This is what you were promised on the Day of Reckoning:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This it is that ye are promised for the Day of Reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is what you are promised on the Day of Reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Such is the Promise made, to you for the Day of Account!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This it is what you (Al-Muttaqun - the pious) are promised for the Day of Reckoning!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is what you are promised on the Day of Recompense,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is what you are promised for the Day of Account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This is what you, [the righteous], are promised for the Day of Account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:53] ‘This, that is mentioned, is what you are promised, by way of the unseen (there is a shift in the address away from the third [to the second] person]) for the Day of Reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah will say to them: (This it is that ye are promised) you were promised in the life of the world (for the Day of Reckoning) on the Day of Judgement.
